tidbits.title: Fjords and Scenic Landscapes
tidbits.description: Norway is renowned for its stunning fjords, picturesque landscapes, Northern Lights, and outdoor activities like hiking and skiing.

tidbits.title: Viking Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich Viking heritage, reflected in museums, historical sites, and festivals celebrating its Norse history.

tidbits.title: Sustainable Living
tidbits.description: Norway is known for its focus on sustainability, embracing renewable energy, environmental policies, and a high quality of life.
